text: In this video,

we'll cover how to change
your name in Fortnite.
Your username in Fortnite
is tied to your Epic Games account.

So your display name
there will affect Fortnite
and any other game running via Epic.

Sign into your account on
the Epic Games website.
Once logged in,
hover over your username

in the top right and select
"Account" from the dropdown.

You'll land on the general
page of account management.

And the first section
will be your account info.
Hover over the blue edit button.
A reminder will appear

that you can only change your
name once every two weeks.
Click the edit button again to begin.
Enter your new name twice,

and click the check mark
to confirm the two-week
wait to change again.
Once you're ready, click confirm.
Your new name will now appear

under "Account Info," and the
blue button will now be gray.
The next time you launch Fortnite,
your new name will appear in the lobby
and in your future matches.
